title: Textile, ca. 1800
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
description: Four scenes that tell a story of Europeans removing blacks from their idyllic island home after the Europeans had been graciously welcomed. in purple on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-174.
